entry.title: Brendan-Kirtlan/Video-Encode
entry.summary:
Encodes a file into a video format to store on a cloud video hosting service

A fun project showing a proof of concept I've thought about for a while. Since some video hosting services let you store unlimited videos, you can store infinite data if used correctly. This project uses lodepng, ffmpeg, and opencv2 to encode files into video format

Video explanation: https://youtu.be/_w6PCHutmb4?si=J81z_G9hhyyJ-BBY
